=
∫
N
(
y∗|φ⊤(x∗)θ, σ2)
N
(
θ|mN, SN
)
dθ (9.57b)
= N
(
y∗|φ⊤(x∗)mN, φ⊤(x∗)SNφ(x∗) + σ2)
. (9.57c)
The term φ⊤(x∗)SNφ(x∗) reﬂects the posterior uncertainty associated
with the parameters θ. Note that SN depends on the training inputs
through Φ; see (9.43b). The predictive mean φ⊤(x∗)mN coincides with
the MAP estimate.
Draft (2019-10-15) of “Mathematics for Machine Learning”. Feedback:https://mml-book.com.
